meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the study and treatment of the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: In nephrology, doctors focus on understanding and treating kidney problems.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in nephrology to help patients with kidney issues.
meanings.sent3: The nephrology conference was full of kidney-shaped balloons and decorations.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to nephrology was as strong as a healthy kidney.
meanings.sent5: Learning about nephrology felt like diving into a pool of kidney knowledge.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the diagnosis and treatment of kidney diseases.
meanings.sent1: Nephrology involves diagnosing and treating various kidney diseases.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired a new nephrology specialist to improve kidney care.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a nephrology skit about talking kidneys.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for nephrology shone as brightly as a healthy kidney.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on nephrology painted a vivid picture of kidney health.
